item.description:
Switched to Sunday. Same time slot. Let me know if you can't make it.

Hi, the pro shop, practice facility and first tee are far away from each other. So we need to be very organized this time.

1. Please arrive 25 minutes prior to your tee time. I will meet you in front of the pro shop. If you want to switch groups, let me know.
2. Because the course charged me $300 for deposit, you will pay me individually (cash or check). Green fee is $65 including cart. If you didn't play Widow's Walk with us last weekend, I will collect another $3 from you to help pay for the meetup website fee.
3. If you have never given me your cell phone number and don't mind doing so, please email me your cell phone number. Thanks.
4. If you need to cancel, please inform me as soon as possible.

2:00pm Deneen, Joe, Amy, Simon
2:10pm Fuji, Cindy, Jay, Paul
2:20pm Steve, Zhen, Linda
item.how_to_find_us: Outside club house or around putting green

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: New England Country Club
